fields.description:
Notification message supports quick actions without having to enter the native android app. e.g. quick reply to text message.

1. Direct replies
2. Bundled notifications
3. Custom views
4. Messaging Style

Like this: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/notifiers/notifications.html

Currently supported method: http://docs.appcelerator.com/aps-sdk-apidoc/latest/android/com/appcelerator/aps/APSPushNotifications.html

Doc link: http://docs.appcelerator.com/arrowdb/latest/#!/guide/android-section-working-with-push-notifications
fields.summary: Native Android: Arrow Push notification feature for Appcelerator Platform Services SDK
